name: RacerAracade
description:
RacerArcade is an Endless Car Racing Game about a guy being late for his work.

so he rushed to his work, but he take the "wrong road" for a shortcut.

This game is aimed at the popular game called Flappy Bird difficulty level !.

Features:
  • basic gameplay
  • changeling gameplay
  • randomize gameplay
  • beautiful pixel art

This game was created by SummerTwig Studio™ 

 This is our first game so... 

  if the game feels simple. that is because of this.

if your game is not working pls read the .txt file to fix it

Controls!

W or Left-arrow to move left

A or Right-arrow to move right

Other information

if you want to make content video such as gameplay, you are free to make it.

just put the game page link in your description.

if you end up making a content video about the game, pls post it in the comment.

we love to see you play our game, this is not required by the way...
